about_the_game:
The demo for Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days immerses you in the world of Walton City, Texas in 1980 and tasks you with managing a group of desperate zombie apocalypse survivors as they try to find their way out of an overrun city. Craft weapons, scavenge resources, balance your group’s needs, and try to get everyone out of danger alive.

Features:

  • Choose from 4 sets of starting survivors, each with their own unique traits and stories.

  • Explore richly-detailed scavenging locations, from a serene church to a neon gaming arcade, to gather precious resources and intel. 

  • Sneak past or confront zombies in direct combat, wielding weapons including axes, baseball bats, and pistols to fight where you can.

  • Manage and upgrade your shelters, crafting improvements and barricading against the ever-present zombie threat.

  • Balance survivor needs like Hunger, Exhaustion and Despair.

  • Hunt through the city to discover new recruitable shelter members.

  • Search the city for clues that can lead to an escape plan.

Get a taste of the game experience before Early Access in 2025!

content_descriptors.notes: This demo may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

Craft weapons, scavenge resources, balance your group’s needs, and try to get everyone out of danger alive.

name: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Texas, 1980. Walton City has fallen to a zombie outbreak. Lead a band of desperate survivors from refuge to refuge by scavenging, crafting, and fighting in a relentless struggle for survival. Can you survive this free demo?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
